Title: Extends certain dates relating to the assessment of real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the twenty-ninth and thirtieth of October two thousand twelve
Summary: Extends certain dates relating to the assessment of real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the twenty-ninth and thirtieth of October two thousand twelve in a city having a population of one million or more to 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to extending certain dates relating to the assessment of real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the twenty-ninth and thirtieth of October two thousand twelve in a city having a population of one million or more
